com.nestedbird.modules.schema

Class SchemaField

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nestedbird.models.core.DataObject
      • com.nestedbird.modules.schema.SchemaField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class SchemaField
extends DataObject
implements java.io.Serializable
    SchemaField is a wrapper around a Field object that provides additional functionality It is specifically designed to read the Field element for various Schema information
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • isVisible

        public java.lang.Boolean isVisible()
        Is this Field visible. By default the answer is false, however if it has a @SchemaView annotation the default is true. We check for a SchemaView annotation or SchemaIgnore annotation
        Returns:
        Whether the field is visible

      • getAnnotation

        public <T extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> java.util.Optional<T> getAnnotation(java.lang.Class<T> annotationClass)
        Gets a specific annotation from the Field, returns it as an optional
        Type Parameters:
        T - The annotation type
        Parameters:
        annotationClass - the annotation class
        Returns:
        the annotation optional

      • getType

        public java.lang.String getType()
        The type of the Field as a string
        Returns:
        the Fields type

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Gets the Fields name We check SchemaView to see if this has been overridden
        Returns:
        the Fields name

      • getView

        public java.lang.String getView()
        Gets the SchemasView, the View is how the information will be presented to the user. Default is Text
        Returns:
        the Fields view

      • getMappings

        public java.lang.String[] getMappings()
        Get an array of any Mappings the Field may have
        Returns:
        The mappings as an Array

      • isEnabled

        public java.lang.Boolean isEnabled()
        Is this Field enabled. By default the answer is false, however if it has a @SchemaView annotation the default is true.
        Returns:
        Whether the field is visible

      • isArray

        public java.lang.Boolean isArray()
        Is this field meant to represent an Array
        Returns:
        Whether or not this field is an array

      • isEnum

        public java.lang.Boolean isEnum()
        Is this field meant to represent an Enumeration
        Returns:
        Whether or not this field is an enum
